definitions.definition: The periodic energizing required to maintain the contents of computer memory , the display luminance of a computer screen, etc.
The update of a display (in a web browser or similar software) to show the latest version of the data.

main_definition: The periodic energizing required to maintain the contents of computer memory , the display luminance of a computer screen, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) The update of a display (in a web browser or similar software) to show the latest version of the data.
